entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
